Banner.Description: I am a Senior Frontend & Full Stack Engineer with 4+ years of experience building scalable web and mobile applications. I specialize in Angular, Next.js, NgRx, Node.js, and TypeScript. Expert in state management, Facade Pattern architecture, and RxJS. I excel at crafting clean, scalable code and developing robust systems with intuitive interfaces. My commitment to industry best practices ensures the creation of reusable and maintainable code. Passionate about optimizing digital solutions and integrating AI-powered workflows, I consistently deliver exceptional results that push the boundaries of innovation.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: As a Senior Frontend Engineer, I am committed to continuous improvement and delivering production-grade solutions. I excel in designing scalable frontend architecture using Angular, Next.js, NgRx, and TypeScript. I am part of a team that values empathy, motivation, and collaboration to set plans and goals together.

My expertise includes implementing NgRx Store with Facade Pattern, managing complex application state with RxJS, building Reactive Forms, optimizing performance through lazy loading, and integrating AI-based workflows. I have proven experience in product-based eCommerce environments and Agile development methodologies.
Some of the technologies and practices I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Full Stack Engineer
Description: Working in a product-based eCommerce environment, contributing to scalable and production-grade web applications.
Developing and enhancing frontend architecture using Angular, Next.js, and TypeScript.
Implementing NgRx Store with Facade Pattern to manage complex product state and improve maintainability.
Building reusable, modular components and optimizing performance using RxJS and lazy loading.
Integrating AI-based workflows to enable dynamic product attribute generation through internal product APIs.
Designing and consuming RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express.
Automating data collection and processing using Node.js and Python scripts.
Collaborating closely with backend, product, and stakeholder teams in Agile sprints.
Working with Docker for local containerized development environments.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Frontend Angular Developer (Lead)
Description: Led development of a Tax Filing System enabling users to view returns, add documents, and manage notifications.
Designed and implemented the complete frontend architecture using Angular and Angular Material.
Built complex Reactive Forms with dynamic form arrays, validations, and structured data workflows.
Managed asynchronous operations and application state using RxJS.
Developed reusable services and modular components to ensure scalability and maintainability.
Integrated REST APIs with centralized error handling, interceptors, and optimized API communication.
Delivered a fully functional, production-ready system aligned with business requirements.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Angular / Flutter Developer
Description: Worked in a project-based software development environment delivering multiple client projects.
Led Angular frontend development across various web applications with REST API integrations.
Developed cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter for Android and iOS.
Integrated AI chatbot functionality into web and mobile applications.
Implemented Augmented Reality features to enhance interactive user experiences.
Customized enterprise components such as Syncfusion calendar for client-specific scheduling systems.
Delivered client-focused solutions with optimized performance and responsive UI design.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Backend Intern
Description: Designed, developed, and maintained high-quality and reliable Python code.
Updated design specifications and source code for the ERP system.
Collaborated with the technical team to improve application performance features.
Performed hardware integration.

FeatureProjects.Title: Projects I have contributed to
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: One Diamond Marketing
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: One Diamond Marketing presents a revolutionary project boasting seamless integration of Syncfusion Calendar, dynamic charts, JSON to PDF conversion, optimized performance, and robust authentication. Angular Reactive Forms are also implemented. Experience the future of marketing.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: One Diamond (Mobile Application)
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: One Diamond Marketing Mobile Application allows clients to view their details on a mobile app. It boasts seamless integration of Syncfusion Calendar, dynamic charts, JSON to PDF conversion, optimized performance, and robust authentication. Angular Reactive Forms are also implemented. Experience the future of marketing.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Pak Foods! (e-commerce website)
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: PakFood, my personal project, is an exciting e-commerce website for food lovers. Explore a curated selection of delicious dishes, including Pakistani cuisine. Enjoy convenient online shopping and order from the comfort of your home. Discover the joy of PakFood today. It includes a  Checkout page, Proceed Order, auth, and stripe integration for secure payments.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Multi-Tasker (Mobile App)
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: This platform offers a solution for tradesmen, enabling them to find their next task without difficulty or waiting for their next project. It resolves the dilemma of tradesmen who prefer not to work for a company where they receive a salary but are still required to work. It includes features like report,  order history, Post Task, auth, and stripe integration for secure payments.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Multi-Tasker - Admin Panel
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: This admin panel for the multi-tasker application empowers administrators to efficiently manage users, tasks, payments, support, and platform security. It includes features such as user management, reporting and analytics, payment management, security and permissions, dashboard, and review and rating management.

OtherProjects.Title: More personal projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: For more personal projects, visit my GitHub

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Let's discuss how I can contribute to your next project with my expertise in full-stack development and cutting-edge technologies.
